    • Method Detail

      • executor

        public CallableExecutor executor​(Group group)
        Description copied from interface: JobScheduler
        Expose a group scheduler as an Executor.

        NOTE: The returned instance might be an implementation of the ExecutorService interface. If so, then it is NOT allowed to shut it down, because the life cycle of the executor is managed by the JobScheduler.

        Specified by:
        executor in interface JobScheduler
        Overrides:
        executor in class JobSchedulerAdapter
